column4: How do you uninstall a program you installed from binary .sh file?
you have a very intensive hunt on your hands
you have to read the .sh and see whre it put everything
and then chase it down and decide what to do with it
then rewrite any changes the sh made to your rc files
thats why i use apt to build (and if the source isnt available to apt, i use checkinstall)
